Title: The Front (No. 74)
Writer: Jon Bokenkamp (created by), Jim Campolongo (teleplay by), Adam Sussman (teleplay by), Adam Sussman (story by), Amanda Kate Shuman (executive story editor), Brandon Margolis (story editor), Brandon Sonnier (story editor)
Actors: James Spader, Megan Boone, Diego Klattenhoff, Ryan Eggold
Plot: Agents Keen, Ressler and Cooper pursue an eco-terrorist cell in search of a destructive weapon. Meanwhile, Liz tries to lose her guardian. Elsewhere, Red uses manipulation to pursue someone close to his heart.
